name: Pre Collapse Facility
desc: This planet harbors numerous ancient Domain-marked facilities, rich with potential valuable data.

name: Coronal Hypershunt
desc: Former Domain gem, this megastructure is capable of harnessing power of the star.

name: Nidavelir Complex
desc: Former Domain gem, this megastructure is capable of producing ships and weapons at scale, never seen in the Persean Sector.

name: Pluto Mining Station
desc: Former Domain gem, this megastructure is capable of excavation and refining enormous amount of resources.
